text: Dakota Joe or Man and a Colt () is a 1967 Argentine Spaghetti Western film directed by Tulio Demicheli, produced by Alberto Grimaldi, and starring Robert Hundar, Fernando Sancho, Gloria Milland, Mirko Ellis, Luis Gaspar, and José Canalejas. It was shot in desierto de Tabernas in Almería; in Manzanares el Real, Seseña and Torrejón de Ardoz in the community of Madrid; and Italy. It is set in Texas and México. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Spaghetti Western films Category:Argentine Western (genre) films Category:Argentine films Category:1967 Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Tulio Demicheli Category:Films produced by Alberto Grimaldi Category:Films produced by Tulio Demicheli Category:Films with screenplays by Tulio Demicheli Category:Films scored by Lallo Gori Category:Films shot in Almería Category:Films shot in Madrid Category:Texas Revolution films Category:Mexican Revolution films
title: Dakota Joe
